name: 1(2) ENG OIL PRESS
description: Associated engine oil pressure below or above limit.

procedure.text: 1. Affected engine â€” Check oil pressure and temperature on PFD/MFD.

procedure.heading: IF engine oil pressure within limits:
procedure.text: - Continue flight monitoring oil pressure and temperature.

procedure.heading: IF engine oil pressure below OR above limits, OR invalid:
procedure.text:
- Achieve safe OEI flight.

On affected engine:
- Carry out ENGINE SHUTDOWN IN EMERGENCY procedure (see page 35).

- Land as soon as practicable.
- Refer to SINGLE ENGINE PROCEDURE (see page 217).
